planet.name: Kepler-155 b
KOI-438 b
KOI-438.01
KIC 12302530 b
KIC 12302530.01
planet.description: Kepler-155 b has been discovered by the Kepler spacecraft and was originally classified as a planet candidate. A new statistical analysis led by a team at NASA Ames Research Center has validated the planet with more than 99 percent confidence. Although many parameters of Kepler-155 b are still unknown, the object is highly unlikely to be a false positive.
